variables.name: SOURCE_EXCEPTION
variables.comment: *  An Exception was thrown reading the {@link Source}.

variables.name: SOURCE_MALFORMED_DATA
variables.comment: *  The encoded data contained an error.

methods.name: public int getError()
methods.comment:
* Retrieve the reason that decoding was interrupted. * *

If the error is {@link #SOURCE_EXCEPTION}, the underlying * {@link java.lang.Throwable} can be retrieved with * {@link java.lang.Throwable#getCause}.

methods.name: public Source getSource()
methods.comment:
* Retrieve the {@link Source Source} that was interrupted. * *

This can be used for equality checking to find the Source which * failed to completely decode.

methods.name: private static String errorMessage(@Error int error, @Nullable Throwable cause)

methodNames: private static String errorMessage(@Error int error, @Nullable Throwable cause)
